sources.note: Main website. Product overview with EMR, PM, imaging, Axon patient engagement, optical shop, and RCM modules. Claims ~20% ophthalmology EMR market share, 98% retention. Founded 2009, Bonita Springs FL.
MACRA/MIPS compliance page. References ONC certification, CQM reporting via Verana Health, real-world test plans 2022-2025. Confirms 2024 Best in KLAS award.
EMR solution page. Limited specific clinical feature details; mentions customizable templates, advanced charting, ophthalmology-specific features, customizable clinical verbiage and treatment plans.

PM solution page. Scheduling, claim tracking via embedded clearinghouse, automated claim follow-up, patient responsibility estimation, online payments, insurance card OCR, business intelligence dashboard. Integrates with 80+ external PM systems.
Axon patient engagement page. Described as 3rd generation system with digital intake and patient reminders. Limited detail on page itself.

Image management page. Supports B-scan, fundus camera, HRT, ICG, ICGA, OCT, autofluorescence. Integrates with Zeiss, iCare, iTrace, Heidelberg, Topcon, Oculus. DICOM and proprietary integrations. Edge computing for local rendering.
Optical shop page (via FlexSys partnership). POS, lab order management, barcoding, inventory control, prescription transmission from EMR to optical shop.
About page. Bootstrapped in 2009, ~20% market share, 98% retention, 3x Inc. 5000 honoree. Developed in collaboration with practicing ophthalmologist. HQ in Bonita Springs, FL.
2024 Best in KLAS award announcement. Satisfaction corroborated by KLAS, AAO/AAOE, ASCRS/ASOA surveys. Mentions AbillifEye RCM service.
FHIR resource center. Links to API documentation at fhir.myeyecarerecords.com/api and FHIR app registration. Gateway page with limited detail.

Third-party review site. Mentions DICOM imaging, HL7 PM integration, FlexSys optical partnership, auto E&M coding, visit summary with abnormal alerts, side-by-side visit comparison. Handles patient history, optical orders, prescriptions, diagnostic imaging, lab orders, financial reporting.

Eyes on Eyecare article on Axon. Details three components: Connect (messaging, reminders, medication adherence, marketing), Captured (digital intake via QR, insurance/medical info, digital consent, terminology translation), Converse (two-way HIPAA-compliant messaging). Patients can review clinical info and images.
